com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing

Class MessageTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.MessageTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageListener, Serializable, EventListener, TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstraintViolationTableModel

    public class MessageTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
implements IMessageListener
    The table model used by the dialog's table. The model attaches itself as a IMessageListener to the Gantt chart and updates itself based on the incoming messages.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
